Fix ActionBarSherlock MenuItem imports

Option Menu (as used in the ActionBar) needs the MenuItem import from
ActionBarSherlock, the conext menu however needs the android.view.MenuItem,
otherwise onContextItemSelected does not work.
Add padding to dialogs, use View.GONE to avoid empty space

Use onStartCommand() in service instead of deprecated onStart()

This should guarantee that the service is always restarted.

Remove connect/disconnect from action bar, use 2.x menu icons
Redo group row background as 9-patch, makes display of list selector easier

And another chunk of warnings gets eliminated.

Signed-off-by: Jan Kiszka <jan.kiszka@web.de>

Initiate reconnect on XMPPConnection drops

If Smackable reports a disconnectOnError, forward this to the registered
XMPPServiceCallback and a postConnectionFailed from callback that our
XMPPService provides. This ensures that we do not end up stuck in
offline state even if the user wishes to reconnect.

Add new string resources for status bar ticker rework

Signed-off-by: Jan Kiszka <jan.kiszka@web.de>

Rework ticker text on new message notifications

There are privacy concerns regarding the ticker text of incoming
messages. Ticker texts are readable even without unlocking the device.

So far we show the sender name, other apps also provide a preview on the
message content. Being consequent, we shouldn't show either if the user
prefers privacy over the preview.

This introduces a configuration options for this. If it's enables, which
is the default, both the sender's name and the first line of the message
is shown in the ticker.
